DESCRIPTION:
ARMA 3 - a new milestone in the genre of tactical military simulation from independent studio Bohemia Interactive, creators of the acclaimed Operation Flashpoint. ARMA 3 has absorbed all the best from previous games in the series and has introduced many innovations. New physics engine allows the player with unprecedented realism to control the fighting. The new model of behavior technology, a wide range of weapons, from the already become classical M16 and AK74 up prototypes, not yet arrived in the widest, as well as the long-awaited fans of the series an opportunity to swim under water. After several years of exhausting war, Europe has become the last refuge in the fighting weakened NATO. Stratis island captured by the enemy in the Middle East and it will gain guaranteed superiority of NATO in the region. Start of operation "Magnitude": a small group of specially trained soldiers with scientists undercover sent to the island in the Mediterranean Sea. Mission under the threat of collapse! The team is almost completely destroyed, and the main character, Captain Scott Miller washed ashore enemy island. Complete the operation in his power, but on his way there are all the dangers of modern warfare, ruthless environment and the numerical superiority of the enemy. Will have to think about every step!

Game Features:
- A new game engine allows you to control combat operations with unprecedented realism.
- Now you can be submerged!
- Variety of weapons - from the "classic" AK-74 and M-16 and not yet published in the mass production of prototypes.
- By combining all the positive qualities of predecessors, with a new engine and evolutionary capabilities, ARMA 3 provides the player with nothing comparable experience in tactical combat.
- Create your own game scenarios using a simple and intuitive mission editor.
